title: Bobcats off to soccer playoffs
text:
Bobcats off to soccer playoffs By: Uncredited Report Error 
Both of the Brandon University Bobcats soccer teams are playoff bound. 
Osian Edwards scored three goals on Saturday to give the BU men a 6-0 win over the Assiniboine Community College Cougars at the Healthy Living Centre field on Saturday to claim the Prowler Cup. Shaun Hewins and Kyle Pacheco added singles with the other coming on an own goal. 
The Bobcats then fell 6-1 to Université de Saint-Boniface (6-2-1) on Sunday in Winnipeg. Osian Edwards had the marker for BU, which finished the season 4-4-2 and tied for fourth place with Red River College. BU was granted the final playoff berth as it went 1-0-1 against Red River College this season. 
The Cougars (0-10-0) capped a winless season with a 13-1 loss to Canadian Mennonite University (7-2-1) on Sunday. 
Meanwhile, the BU women beat ACC by forfeit on Saturday. The Bobcats finished the season in second place with a 6-2-0 record while the Cougars went 1-7-0 after forfeiting Sunday’s game to CMU (4-4-0). 
The league semifinals and final will take place next weekend.
